border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm \left(-10\hat{i}+5\hat{k}\right)W </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>10</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="width: 6.833em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo accent=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo accent=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>2.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3.1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4.2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="width: 14.428em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.166em;"><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">¯</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>v বেগে চলমান একটি বুলেট 2&nbsp;টি তক্তা ভেদ করতে পারে। কত বেগে চললে অনুরূপ 6&nbsp;টি তক্তা ভেদ করতে পারবে?</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-126" style="width: 2.279em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-127"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-128"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.323em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.46em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-129"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-132" style="width: 4.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1003.65em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-133"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-136" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\rm n=\frac{6}{2}=3 </script></span></p>

<p>তাহলে, n&nbsp;গুণ গতিশক্তি প্রয়োজন।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="width: 20.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1016.44em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-142"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-143" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.486em, 1000.29em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-159" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-163"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.24em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.71em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-164"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-165" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-166"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-167"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.789em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-174" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-175" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-178"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1002.62em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-179"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-181"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-182"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-183"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.588em; left: 2.789em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm \therefore E_k^\prime=n\times\frac{1}{2}mv^2=\frac{1}{2}m\left(\sqrt nv\right)^2=\frac{1}{2}m\left(\sqrt3v\right)^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-189"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="width: 1.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.559em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1001.56em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-192"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-193"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-194"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm \sqrt3v</script></span>&nbsp;বেগে চলতে হবে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ক্রেন <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="width: 1.827em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.492em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.34em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-198"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-200"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-201"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">60°</script></span> ঢালের 5m&nbsp;উঁচু ঘর্ষণহীন তল বরাবর 50N&nbsp;ওজনের একটি পাথর টেনে তুলছে। পাথরটি সমদ্রুতিতে চললে ক্রেনটির অভিকর্ষের বিরুদ্ধে কৃতকাজ কত?</p>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>উল্লম্ব উচ্চতা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.67em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-211"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm h=5m</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-216" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-217"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;কৃতকাজ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>250</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-219" style="width: 11.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.018em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.98em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-220"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-221" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-225" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">250</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>250</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm W=Fh=50\times5=250J</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>গতিশক্তির মাত্রা কোনটি?</p>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি বস্তুকে খাড়াভাবে ওপরের দিকে ছুড়ে দেওয়া হলো। কোন গ্রাফটি ভূমি হতে উচ্চতা h&nbsp;এর সাপেক্ষে বস্তুটির বিভবশক্তি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="width: 1.418em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.157em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.16em, 2.647em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-282"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-283"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.157em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.63em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px;                                         </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>98</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-293" style="width: 23.814em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-328" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">98</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>98</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm W=mgh=mg\times\left(\frac{l}{2}-\frac{0}{2}\right)=2\times9.8\times\left(\frac{10}{2}-0\right)=98J </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 180px; height: 104px;"></p>

<p>চিত্র অনুযায়ী কৃতকাজ কত?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>W = আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>30</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="width: 16.518em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1013.49em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-333"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-343"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">30</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>30</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm =\frac{1}{2}\times5\times\left(8+4\right)=\frac{1}{2}\times5\times12=30J</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ঝুলন্ত দড়ি সর্বোচ্চ &nbsp;250N টান সহ্য করতে পারলে 50kg ভরের একজন লোক ঐ দড়ি বেয়ে সর্বনিম্ন কত ত্বরণে নিচে নামতে পারবে?&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="width: 7.193em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.889em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.977em, 1005.66em, 3.988em, -999.998em); top: -3.24em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-360"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-361"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">[</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-363"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-368"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.306em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.132em, 1000.86em, 4.361em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-369"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-370"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-371"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-372"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.243em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.816em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.275em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm\left[g=10m{/s}^2\right]</script></span></p>

                                        </div>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="width: 27.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 22.666em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1022.67em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-422"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">250</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-437" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">250</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-448"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-450"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-451"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm W-T=ma\Rightarrow50\times10-250=50a \Rightarrow250=50a\therefore a=5ms^{-2} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>5m উচ্চতা হতে একটি 2kg&nbsp;ভরের বস্তুকে ফেলে দিলে ভূমি স্পর্শ করার মুহূর্তে ঐ বস্তুর বেগ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>9.8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="width: 4.556em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.736em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1003.74em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-494"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9.8</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-496" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-498"><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-559"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-560"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>98</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm E_p=E_k\Rightarrow mgh=\frac{1}{2}mv^2\Rightarrow gh=\frac{1}{2}v^2 \Rightarrow v=\sqrt{2gh}=\sqrt{2\times9.8\times5}=\sqrt{98\ }ms^{-1} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 10 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি কাঠের গুড়ির উপর 20N&nbsp;বল প্রয়োগের ফলে 3m&nbsp;সরণ হয় যা বলের ক্রিয়ারেখার সাথে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>120</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.014em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.87em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-564"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">120</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-566"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-567"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>120</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">120°</script></span> কোণ উৎপন্ন করে। কৃতকাজ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><msup><mn>120</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>30</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="width: 25.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.74em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1020.7em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-590"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-596" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-603" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-604" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-605" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-606" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-608"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.48em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">120</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.518em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-610" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-611" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-612" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-617" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-618"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-620"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-621" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-622" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-623" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-624" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-627" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><msup><mn>120</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>30</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm W=Fs\ cos\theta=20\times3\times cos120^\circ=20\times3\times\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)=-30J</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 11 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B8;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-628" style="width: 8.05em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.596em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1006.45em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-629"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">90</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-631"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-632"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-634" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">≤</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-635" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-636"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-637" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-638" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">≤</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-639" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">180</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-640"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-641"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-642" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>90</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>≤</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>θ</mo></mrow><mo>≤</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm 90°≤θ≤180°</script></span>&nbsp;হলে কৃতকাজ কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ঋণাত্মক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ধনাত্মক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>শূন্য</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>A ও C উভয়</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-643" style="width: 5.248em; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm W=Fscos\theta</script></span>&nbsp;।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                             <p>60m উচ্চতা হতে কোনো বস্তু পড়তে থাকলে ভূমি থেকে কত উচ্চতায় বিভবশক্তি গতিশক্তির অর্ধেক হবে?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;
