position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-726" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-727" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.548em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>60</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\rm\frac{1}{2}E_k=E_p\Rightarrow mg\ \left(h-x\right)=2mgx \\ \Rightarrow h-x=2x\therefore x=\frac{h}{3}=\frac{60}{3}m=20m </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 180px; height: 87px;"></p>

<p>চিত্রের <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-733" style="width: 0.374em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-736" style="width: 0.859em; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="width: 15.33em; top: -2.949em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-775"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-785" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-786" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-787"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-size: 50%; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-797" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্ফেরোমিটারের সাহায্যে একটি উত্তল লেন্সের বক্রতার ব্যাসার্ধ নির্ণয়ের পরীক্ষায় সমতল কাচপাতের ওপর বসিয়ে পাঠ পেল&nbsp;1cm&nbsp;। উত্তল লেন্সটির ওপর বসিয়ে পাঠ পেল&nbsp;2cm&nbsp;। স্ফেরোমিটারের পায়ের মধ্যবর্তী&nbsp;গড় দূরত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msqrt><mn>6</mn></msqrt><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="width: 2.982em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>6</mn></msqrt><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-813" style="width: 12.871em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-814"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-815" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-818"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-819"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-820" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-822" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-824" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-825" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-826" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-827" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-828" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-829"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-830" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-832" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-836" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-837" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>6</mn></msqrt><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-55">d=\frac{\sqrt6}{10}m,\ h=\left(2-1\right)=1cm </script></span></p>

<p>গোলীয়তলের বক্রতার ব্যাসার্ধ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>h</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-838" style="width: 14.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.477em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1011.48em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-839"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-840" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-841" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0.005</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1.005</mn><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="width: 9.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.79em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-894"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.005</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.005</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-901" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0.005</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1.005</mn><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">=1+0.005=1.005m </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-902" style="width: 5.453em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-903"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-904"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-906" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-907" style="font-size: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 17 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নাইট্রোজেনের 7&nbsp;নম্বর ইলেকট্রনের জন্য কোন কোয়ান্টাম সংখ্যার সেটটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>H পরমাণুর ইলেকট্রনটি 5<sup>th</sup> কক্ষপথ থেকে 2<sup>nd</sup> কক্ষপথে ফিরে এলে, সর্বোচ্চ কতটি বর্ণালি রেখার সৃষ্টি সম্ভব?</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="width: 6.764em; </span>

                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন আয়নটির ইলেকট্রন বিন্যাস&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>0</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="width: 6.41em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.255em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1005.25em, 2.61em, -999.998em); height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.55em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.549em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi>π</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\rm \frac{h}{\pi} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1171" style="width: 9.1em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1177" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.442em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.503em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>14</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>7</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>15</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>8</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>16</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\rm {_{\ \ 6}^{14}}C,\ {_{\ \ 7}^{15}}N,\ {_{\ \ 8}^{16}}O </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>None</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1416" style="width: 10.956em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1453" style="width: 2.78em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.279em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.19em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1454"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1457" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.108em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\rm e>1 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1458" style="width: 2.78em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.279em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.23em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1459"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\rm e=0 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সমীকরণটি অধিবৃত্তের, সুতরাং, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="width: 2.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.8em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1464"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\rm e>1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 32 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1468" style="width: 6.708em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99">\rm \frac{x^2}{\frac{1}{4}}-\frac{y^2}{1}=1\Rightarrow\frac{x^2}{\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^2}-\frac{y^2}{1^2}=1</script></span></p>

<p>সুতরাং শীর্ষবিন্দু,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1570" style="width: 3.65em; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1578" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;                             </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 33 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1583" style="width: 4.957em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.063em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.06em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1584"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1585"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1587" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">12</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">\rm y^2=12\ x</script></span> পরাবৃত্তের <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1592" style="width: 3.02em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1632" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1633"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1634"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1635" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1636"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1637" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1638" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1639" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1640" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1641" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-107">\left(3,\ 6\right)</script></span> বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1642" style="width: 7.42em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1006.07em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1643"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1644" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1645" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1646" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1647" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1648" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1650" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1651"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1652" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1653" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1654" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1655" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">\rm y\times6=12\times\frac{x+3}{2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1656" style="width: 14.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1011.6em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1657"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1661" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1663" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1664" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1666"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1667" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">\rm \Rightarrow y\times6=6\left(x+3\right)\Rightarrow y=x+3</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-110-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1677" style="width: 6.764em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1005.49em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1678"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1679" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-110">\rm \therefore x-y+3=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>cot</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1687" style="width: 17.178em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.085em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1014.05em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1688"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1692" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1699" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">cot</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1708"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1710"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-111">\rm x=2\ cosec\ \theta+5,\ y=3\cot{\theta}-2</script></span>&nbsp;দ্বারা সূচিত কনিক নিচের কোনটি নির্দেশ করে?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-112-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="width: 15.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1012.26em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1715"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1723" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1726" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1727" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1728" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1736" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1738" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1739"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1740" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1741" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1742" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-112">\rm x=2\ cosec\ \theta+5\Rightarrow cosec\ \theta=\frac{x-5}{2} ; </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>cot</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1745" style="width: 12.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1010.45em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1746"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1748" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cot</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1751"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1752" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1753"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1754" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1756" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1757" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1758" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">cot</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1759"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1760" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1761"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1762" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1764" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1765"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1767" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1768" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-113">\rm y=3\cot{\theta}-2\Rightarrow\cot{\theta}=\frac{y+2}{3}</script></span></p>

<p>এবং,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>cot</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1770" style="width: 8.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1006.97em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1771"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1772"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.22em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1773"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1774"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 2.215em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1780" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1781"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1782"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1783" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1784" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1787" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1794" style="width: 10.617em; </span>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>36</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1822" style="width: 7.975em;                                 <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>18</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1843" style="width: 1.368em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.68em, 4.146em, -999.998em);                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1867" style="width: 2.379em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1868"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;
