overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\rm a=6 </script></span> এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>5</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1872" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.67em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1873"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>5</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">\rm b=\sqrt5</script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1879" style="width: 0.658em; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-123">\therefore</script></span> উপকেন্দ্রিক লম্বের দৈর্ঘ্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1882" style="width: 8.158em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1901" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1902" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1903" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">\rm =\frac{2\times b^2}{a}=\frac{2\times5}{6}=\frac{5}{3}</script></span> একক</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 36 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1904" style="width: 7.118em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.814em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.194em, 1005.78em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1905"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1906"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.467em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.132em, 1002.95em, 4.361em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1907"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1909"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1915" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1916" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>X</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Y</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1946" style="width: 4.305em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.53em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1947"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1948"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1949" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">X</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1950" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1951" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1952" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1953" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1954" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Y</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-130">\rm X^2=4aY</script></span> এর সাথে তুলনা করে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>X</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1955" style="width: 8.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1006.76em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1956"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1957" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">X</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1958" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1959" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1960" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1961"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1962" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1963" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1965" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1969" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-131">\rm X=\left(x+1\right),\ a=2</script></span></p>

<p>এবং দিকাক্ষ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-132-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1971" style="width: 13.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.027em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1010.99em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1972"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1979" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1980" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1982" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1984" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1987" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-132">\rm Y=-a\Rightarrow y=-2\therefore y+2=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 37 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-133-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1988" style="width: 9.503em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1007.75em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1989"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1990"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1992" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1994" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1995" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-138-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2042" style="width: 23.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1019.47em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2043"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2044"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2046" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2047" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2048" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2052" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2053" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2056" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2057" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2058" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2059" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2060" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2063" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2064" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2067" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2068" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2070" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2072" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2073" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-138">\rm x^2-10x+5y=0\Rightarrow x^2-2\times x\times5+25+5y-25=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-139-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2074" style="width: 11.518em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.428em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1009.39em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2075"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2076" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2077" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2078"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2080"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2081" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2082" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2083" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2084" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2085" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2087" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2088" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2089" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2091"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2092" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2096" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-139">\rm \Rightarrow\left(x-5\right)^2=-5\left(y-5\right)\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;পরাবৃত্তের শীর্ষ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-140-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2097" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2098"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2099"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2100" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2101"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-140">\left(5,\ 5\right)</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 38 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি উপবৃত্তের ক্ষুদ্রাক্ষ এর বৃহদাক্ষের অর্ধেক হলে, এবং উপকেন্দ্রিক লম্বের দৈর্ঘ্য 5&nbsp;একক হলে, উপবৃত্তটির ক্ষুদ্রাক্ষের দৈর্ঘ্য কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>প্রশ্নমতে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2107" style="width: 9.428em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1007.67em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2108"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2109"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2110" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2111" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2112"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2114"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-141">\rm \frac{1}{2}\left(2a\right)=2b\Rightarrow a=2b</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-142-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2126" style="width: 3.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1002.67em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2127"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2128"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.07em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2129"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2130" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2131"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2132" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2133" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-142">\rm \frac{2b^2}{a}=5</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-143-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2137" style="width: 13.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1010.82em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2138"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2140" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.07em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2141"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2142" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2143"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2144" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2145" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2146"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2147" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2148" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2155" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2159" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>∴</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-143">\rm \Rightarrow\frac{2b^2}{2b}=5\Rightarrow b=5\therefore2b=10</script></span>&nbsp;একক</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-149-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; columnspacing=&quot;1em&quot;><mtr><mtd><mi>a</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>h</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>g</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>h</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>b</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>f</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>g</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>f</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>c</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2226" style="width: 6.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.436em, 1005.45em, 5.494em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2227"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2230" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2231" style="vertical-align: 2.174em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -0.449em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -2.334em;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                            <span>Question 40 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-157-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>15</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2301" style="width: 2.188em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.778em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.73em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2302"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">15</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>15</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-157">-15 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>প্রশ্নমতে, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-158-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2305" style="width: 5.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.67em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2306"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2309" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-158">\rm a=3,\ m=5</script></span> এবং পরাবৃত্তের স্পর্শক হবার জন্য,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-159-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2315" style="width: 11.15em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1009.14em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2316"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2321"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2323" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2330" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2332" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-159">\rm c=-am^2\Rightarrow c=-3\times5^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-160-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>75</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>75</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>150</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2333" style="width: 16.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.363em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1013.32em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2334"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">75</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2340" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2346" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2348"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">75</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">150</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>75</mn><mo>∴</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>75</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>150</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-160">\rm \Rightarrow c=-75\therefore2c=2\times\left(-75\right)=-150</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 41 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-161-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2355" style="width: 3.951em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-163-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2382" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.23em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2383"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-163">-3 </script></span></p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-164-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2386" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.23em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2387"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-164">-6 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-165-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2390" style="width: 1.869em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-166-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2396" style="width: 18.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1015.37em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2397"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2398"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2399"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2400"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-167-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2434" style="width: 11.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1009.47em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2435"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2437" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2438"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2439" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2440" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2445" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.871em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.67em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2446"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2447" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2448"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2449" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2450"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2451" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2452" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.87em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.871em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2460" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2461" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2463"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-167">\rm \Rightarrow\frac{dy}{dx}=\frac{-\left(4x+5\right)}{6y}\ \therefore\left(-1,\ 1\right)</script></span>&nbsp;বিন্দুতে স্পর্শকের ঢাল,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mo fence=&quot;false&quot; stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>{</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo fence=&quot;false&quot; stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>}</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2470" style="width: 14.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.764em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1011.76em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2471"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2472"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                            <span>Question 42 </span>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-173-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2571" style="width: 7.789em;                                 </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>অসীমতটদ্বয়,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-174-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>36</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2581" style="width: 8.076em;
