margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1002.13em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2584"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.76em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2585"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2586" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2587"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2588" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2589" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>36</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-174">\rm \frac{\left(x+1\right)^2}{36}-\frac{\left(y-2\right)^2}{9}=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-175-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>36</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2608" style="width: 14.674em; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2648" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>36</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-175">\rm \Rightarrow\frac{\left(x+1\right)^2}{36}=\frac{\left(y-2\right)^2}{9}\Rightarrow\frac{x+1}{6}=\pm\frac{y-2}{3}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-176-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2649" style="width: 10.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1008.2em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2650"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2652" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2654"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2656" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2661" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2663"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2664" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2666" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2667" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-176">\rm \Rightarrow\left(x+1\right)=\pm\left(2y-4\right)</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-177-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2669" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2670"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2671" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-177">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;অসীমতটদ্বয়ের সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-178-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2672" style="width: 6.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.166em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.12em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2673"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 43 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন পরাবৃত্তের অক্ষ x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল ও শীর্ষবিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-180-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2692" style="width: 3.616em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1002.87em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2693"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2694"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2696"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-183-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2732" style="width: 7.106em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2733"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2734"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.463em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-185-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2761" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2762"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2763"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2765"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2770" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-185">\left(1,\ 0\right)</script></span> শীর্ষবিন্দু এবং x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল অক্ষবিশিষ্ট পরাবৃত্তের সমীকরণ, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-186-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2771" style="width: 17.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1013.86em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2772"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2773"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2774"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2776"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2781" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2783" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2784" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2785" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2787"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2789" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2790" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2793" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2795" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2799" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2801"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-186">\rm \left(y-0\right)^2=4a\left(x-1\right)\Rightarrow y^2=4a\left(x-1\right)</script></span>&nbsp;; যা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-187-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2806" style="width: 6.764em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2807"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2808"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2810" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2811" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2812" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2814" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2815" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2816"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-187">\rm y^2=-4\left(x-1\right)</script></span> এর অনুরূপ।</p>
</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 44 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-188-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2821" style="width: 6.708em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2828" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2832" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-188">\rm 2x^2+y^2=5</script></span>&nbsp;কনিকটির উৎকেন্দ্রিকতা কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-193-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2857" style="width: 12.174em; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2880" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.047em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-193">\rm \frac{2x^2}{5}+\frac{y^2}{5}=1\Rightarrow\frac{x^2}{\frac{5}{2}}+\frac{y^2}{5}=1</script></span></p>

padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2940" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2950"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2951"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2952" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mn>5</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-197">\rm e=\sqrt{1-\frac{a^2}{b^2}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{\frac{5}{2}}{5}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{1}{2}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt2}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 45 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>p এর কোন মানের জন্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-198-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2953" style="width: 7.379em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>অধিবৃত্তের সমীকরণে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-200-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2970" style="width: 0.945em;                             <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Biology (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 46 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কত সপ্তাহে সর্বপ্রথম মানবভ্রূণে সারফ্যাকট্যান্ট ক্ষরণ শুরু হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>১২ সপ্তাহ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>২৩ সপ্তাহ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>২৪ সপ্তাহ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>২৮ সপ্তাহ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ২৩ সপ্তাহ বয়সে মানবভ্রূণে সারফ্যাকট্যান্ট ক্ষরণ শুরু হয় এ কারণে- ২৪ সপ্তাহের আগে মানবভ্রূণকে স্বাধীন অস্তিত্বের অধিকারী বলে গণ্য করা হয় না।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 47 </span>

                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Bangla (15)</h2>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 61 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>জসীমউদ্দীন&nbsp;রচিত ‘নিমন্ত্রণ’ কবিতাটি কোন কাব্যগ্রন্থের অন্তর্ভুক্ত?</p>

                                        </div>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>‘প্রতিদান’ কবিতায় কবি কাঁটা পেয়ে কি দান করেছেন?</p>

</label>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: প্রতিদান কবিতায় কবি কাঁটা পেয়ে ফুল দান করেন। পঙ্ক্তিটি এমন। “কাঁটা পেয়ে তারে ফুল করি দান সারাটি জনম ভর।”</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: যে কবিকে পথের বিবাগী করেছে, কবি প্রতিদানে তার উপকার করতে চান। তাই তাকে তিনি পথে পথে খুঁজছেন।</p>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কারাগারে অনশনরত অবস্থায় বঙ্গবন্ধুর আরেক সঙ্গী ছিলেন- আওয়ামীলীগ নেতা মহিউদ্দিন আহমেদ। তিনিও বঙ্গবন্ধুর সাথে রাজবন্দী ছিলেন।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">

                                        </div>

                                    </div>

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p style="text-align: justify;">জেনে রাখো: বঙ্গবন্ধুর অবস্থানরত জেলের সুপারিনটেনডেন্ট ছিলেন আমীর হোসেন। বায়ান্নর দিনগুলোতে উদ্ধৃত হয়েছে এভাবে- “জেল কর্তৃপক্ষ বিশেষ করে সুপারিনটেনডেন্ট আমীর হোসেন সাহেব ও তখনকার দিনে রাজবন্দীদের ডেপুটি জেলার মোখলেসুর রহমান সাহেব আমাদের বুঝাতে অনেক চেষ্টা করেন।”</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অনশন চলাকালীন বঙ্গবন্ধুর লিখিত চিঠির সংখ্যা কয়টি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বঙ্গবন্ধু অনশন চলাকালীন সময়ে, মোট চারটি চিঠি লিখেন। তার পিতার কাছে একটা, রেনুর কাছে একটা, হোসেন শহীদ সোহরাওয়ার্দী আর মাওলানা ভাসানীর কাছে একটা করে চিঠি লেখেন।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>An intransitive verb does not need a direct object, Sub + I.V + adj/Adv. phrase.</p>
</span>

    <div class="TakeExamHeader">
        
        
        
        <h2 style="font-size: 25px;">Written Master Set: 1 (Question &amp; Solution)</h2>
    </div>
            <div class="TakeExamBody">
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Physics (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>একটি ইটের দৈর্ঘ্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 2.61em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">\rm 0.5m</script></span>, প্রস্থ&nbsp;0.25m ও উচ্চতা 0.1m। এর ভর 6kg হলে, অনুভূমিক অবস্থান হতে এটিকে উলম্ব অবস্থায় রাখতে কৃতকাজ কত?&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; 			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>ভারকেন্দ্রের উলম্ব সরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>0.5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>0.1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-19" style="width: 11.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.059em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1009.06em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-20"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-21" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-22" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-23" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-24" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-25"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-26"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-27" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-28" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-29" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-30" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-31" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-32" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-33" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-36" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>0.5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>0.1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm h=\left(\frac{0.5}{2}-\frac{0.1}{2}\right)m=0.2m</script></span></p>

<p>কৃতকাজ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="width: 15.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1012.34em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-39"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-40" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-44" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-45" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-47" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-48"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-49" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-51" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-52" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-53" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-54" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">J</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-58" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\rm W=mgh=\left(6\times10\times0.2\right)J=12J</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ&nbsp;</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="width: 4.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.28em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-60"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-62" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-64" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm h=0.2m</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="width: 4.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.49em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-66"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-68" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-69" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-71" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">\rm W=mgh</script></span> সূত্রের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
মান বসানোর জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-72" style="width: 3.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.16em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-73"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\rm W=12J</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>একটি দোলকের ববের কেন্দ্র থেকে এর ঝুলন বিন্দুর দূরত্ব 2.5 মিটার। ববটিকে লম্ব রেখার সাথে 60° কোণ করে একদিকে টেনে ছেড়ে দেওয়া হলো। স্থির অবস্থান অতিক্রম করার সময় এর বেগ কত হবে?&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="width: 6.82em; 			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>

                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>U</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>U</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="width: 18.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1015.37em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-93"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-94"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">U</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-100" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">U</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-118" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-119" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-120" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-122"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm U_i+K_i=U_f+K_f\Rightarrow mgh+0=0+\frac{1}{2}mv^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="width: 14.756em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>.</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-152" style="width: 15.33em; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong>&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="width: 4.469em;
