left: 0.371em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm v=\sqrt{2gh}</script></span> সূত্রের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
মান বসানোর জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="width: 4.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.94em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-192"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-198"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-200"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-201"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm v=5\ ms^{-1}</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>30° কোণে আনত একটি তলে 100 kg ভরের একটি বস্তুকে তল বরাবর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="width: 4.547em;                                         <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>30</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>500</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="width: 17.625em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-229"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-232" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-236" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-237" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>30</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>500</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm F=mgsin\theta=100\times10\times sin30°=500N</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-253" style="width: 18.773em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-254"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-255"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-265"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-266"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-282"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-283"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-287" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-290" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-291" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-292" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm F_{net}=F_{ext}-F-F_f\Rightarrow ma=F_{ext}-F-F_f</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>100</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>500</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>20</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-293" style="width: 13.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1011.39em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-294"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-296" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-298"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-299" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-304" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-306"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-307"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-308" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-309" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-310" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">500</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">20</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>100</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><mn>500</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm \Rightarrow\left(100\times0.1\right)=F_{ext}-500-20</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>530</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-315" style="width: 9.428em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1007.62em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-316"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-320"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-321"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">530</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>530</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm \therefore F_{ext}=530N\ (Ans.)</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>500</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="width: 4.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.45em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-336"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">500</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>500</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm F=500N</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>530</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="width: 5.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.3em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-342"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-343"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-345"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-346"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">530</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>530</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm F_{ext}=530N</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র.:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>

			<td><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="width: 4.249em; 			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>

                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="width: 11.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1009.55em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-370"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-371"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-381"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm E_k=W\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}mv^2=5\times Fs</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>50</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="width: 19.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.699em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1015.66em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-390"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.01</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-399"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-400"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">25</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>50</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm \Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}\times0.01\times{50}^2=5\times F\times0.1\Rightarrow F=25N</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="width: 6.6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.412em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005.37em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-415"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-416"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-420"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-422" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm \frac{1}{2}mv^2=5\times Fs</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="width: 3.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.03em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-429"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">25</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm F=25N</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র.: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</strong></p>

<p><strong>বিকল্প সমাধান: </strong>বুলেটের ত্বরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="width: 22.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1018.28em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-435"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-437" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-444"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">u</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-447"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-448" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.05em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.051em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-450"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">[</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-452"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-457"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-459"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-460"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">u</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-469"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-471"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-472"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-481"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-482" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-484" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">m</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-487" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm a=\frac{v^2-u^2}{2s}\left[v=0ms^{-1},\ u=50ms^{-1},\ s=\left(0.1\times5\right)m\right]</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2500</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="width: 12.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.33em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.617em, 1010.33em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-489"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-492" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.871em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1002.79em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.391em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-494"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-495"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-498" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-499"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-517"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-518"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>50</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>.1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2500</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm \Rightarrow a=\frac{0^2-\left(50\right)^2}{2\times.1\times5}=-2500ms^{-2}</script></span></p>

<p>বাঁধাদানকারী বল,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.01</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2500</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-521" style="width: 14.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1011.8em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-522"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-524" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-525" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-530"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.01</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2500</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">N</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">25</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.01</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2500</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm F=ma=\left(0.01\times2500\right)N=25N</script></span></p>

<p><strong>বিকল্প নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2500</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-539" style="width: 6.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.58em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-540"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2500</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-546"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-548"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-549"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-550" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-551" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2500</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\rm a=-2500ms^{-2}</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-552" style="width: 3.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.03em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-553"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">25</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">\rm F=25N</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র.: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</strong></p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>(a) পাউলির বর্জন নীতিটি লিখ। (০.৫)<br>
			(b) রাদারফোর্ড ও বোর পরমাণু মডেলের তিনটি পার্থক্য লিখ। (০২)</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">(a)&nbsp;একই পরমাণুতে দুটি ইলেকট্রনের চারটি কোয়ান্টাম সংখ্যার মান কখনো সমান থাকে না। কমপক্ষে যেকোনো একটির মান অসমান হয়।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">(b)&nbsp;(i) রাদারফোর্ডের পরমাণু মডেলের ভিত্তি হলো আলফা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="width: 1.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.07em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-559"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">(\alpha)</script></span> কণা বিচ্ছুরণ পরীক্ষার পর্যবেক্ষণ নির্ভর সিদ্ধান্তসমূহ।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">অপরদিকে, বোর পরমাণু মডেলের ভিত্তি হলো রাদারফোর্ড পরমাণু মডেলের পরমাণুর কেন্দ্রস্থ নিউক্লিয়াস ও নিউক্লিয়াস বহির্ভূত ইলেকট্রন অঞ্চলের সাথে ম্যাক্স প্লাঙ্ক ও আইনস্টাইনের আলোক সম্পর্কীয় বিকিরণের কোয়ান্টাম তত্ত্বের সমন্বয়।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">(ii) রাদারফোর্ডের পরমাণু মডেলে ইলেকট্রনের কক্ষপথের আকার ও সংখ্যাকে সুস্পষ্ট করা হয়নি।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">অপরদিকে, বোর পরমাণুতে প্রতিটি ইলেকট্রন কয়েকটি নির্দিষ্ট মানের ব্যাসার্ধের বৃত্তাকার স্থায়ী কক্ষপথে নিউক্লিয়াসকে আবর্তন করে থাকে।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">(iii) রাদারফোর্ডের পরমাণু মডেলের স্থায়িত্বের কারণ দেখানো হয়েছে ধনাত্মক চার্জযুক্ত কেন্দ্রস্থ নিউক্লিয়াস ও ঋণাত্মক চার্জযুক্ত ইলেকট্রনের মধ্যস্থ স্থির বৈদ্যুতিক আকর্ষণজনিত কেন্দ্রমুখী বল এবং আবর্তনশীল ইলেকট্রনের কেন্দ্রবহির্মুখী বলদ্বয়ের লব্ধিফল।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">অপরদিকে বোর পরমাণু মডেলের স্থায়িত্বের কারণ দেখানো হয়েছে পরমাণুর নিউক্লিয়াসের প্রভাবে সৃষ্ট নির্দিষ্ট সংখ্যক শক্তিস্তরে ইলেকট্রনের অবস্থান এবং শক্তি বিকিরণ ছাড়া ঐ সব স্থির শক্তির কক্ষপথে সতত সমশক্তিতে আবর্তন করে।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">(a) পাউলির বর্জন নীতিটি লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">(b) যে কোনো&nbsp; 1/2টি পার্থক্য লেখার জন্য ০.১ নম্বর।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">তিনটি পার্থক্য লেখার জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>বি.দ্র:</strong> পার্থক্যগুলোর ক্ষেত্রে মূলভাব প্রকাশ করতে পারাটাই যথেষ্ট এক্ষেত্রে হুবহু লিখতে পারাটা জরুরি নয়।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>(a) দ্রাব্যতা গুণফল কী? (০.৫)</p>

			<p>(b) 35℃ তাপমাত্রায় 5g NaCl , 25g পানিতে দ্রবীভূত হয়ে সম্পৃক্ত দ্রবণ উৎপন্ন করে। উক্ত তাপমাত্রায় NaCl এর দ্রাব্যতা কত? (০২)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">(a)&nbsp;কোনো নির্দিষ্ট তাপমাত্রায় কোনো স্বল্প দ্রবণীয় তড়িৎ বিশ্লেষ্য লবণের সম্পৃক্ত দ্রবণে এর উপাদান আয়নসমূহের মোল প্রতিলিটার এককে ঘনমাত্রার গুণফলকে লবণটির দ্রাব্যতা গুণফল বলে। তবে লবণটির প্রতি অণু বিয়োজনে যে আয়নটি যত সংখ্যায় উৎপন্ন হয়, ঐ আয়নের ঘনমাত্রাকে সে সংখ্যক ঘাতে উন্নীত করা হয়।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">(b)<b> </b>দ্রাব্যতা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo
