class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-603" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-604"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-605"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-606" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-608" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-611"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-612" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-613" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>25</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm s\ =\frac{solute\ \left(g\right)\times100}{solvent\ (g)}=\frac{5}{25}\times100=20g/\ 100g\ H_2O\ (Ans.)</script></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><b>নম্বর</b> <b>বণ্টন</b><b>:</b></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">(a)&nbsp;দ্রাব্যতা গুণফলের সংজ্ঞা লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">(b)&nbsp;সূত্র লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p>সূত্রে মান বসানোর জন্য ০.৭৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-622" style="width: 8.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1006.68em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-623"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-624" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-627" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-628"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-629"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-632" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-634" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-635"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-636" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-637" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-638" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm s=20g/\ 100g\ H_2O</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৭৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>বি.দ্র.:</strong></p>

<p>(i) একক না লিখলে অথবা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করতে হবে।</p>

<p>(ii) সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি সূত্রে মান বসালেও গ্রহণযোগ্য হবে।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">

			<td>
			<p>(a)&nbsp;2d অরবিটাল সম্ভব নয় কেন? (০১)</p>

			<p>(b) দ্রবণে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-639" style="width: 2.61em; <p><b>নম্বর</b> <b>বণ্টন</b><b>:</b></p>

<p>(a)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-759" style="width: 2.42em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-764" style="width: 4.1em; \rm d</script></span> অরবিটালের জন্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="width: 2.174em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-774"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-775" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

<p>(b) বিক্রিয়ার জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>বি.দ্র.:</strong></p>

<p>(i) অন্য যেকোনো যুক্তিযুক্ত বিক্রিয়ার সাহায্যে শনাক্ত করলেও গ্রহণযোগ্য হবে।</p>

<p>(ii) বিক্রিয়ার সমতাকরণ করার প্রয়োজন নেই।</p>

<p>(iii) বিক্রিয়ার মূল উৎপাদ/উৎপাদসমূহ লিখাই যথেষ্ট।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8</span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>(a) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-778" style="width: 2.759em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-784" style="width: 2.163em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.753em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.75em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-785"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\rm HCl</script></span> এসিড যোগ করলে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-789" style="width: 2.759em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.237em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.24em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-790"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\rm NaCl </script></span> কেলাসিত হয় কেন? (০১)</p>

			<p>(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="width: 3.318em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.722em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.72em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-796"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-799"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-801" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">\rm KNO_3</script></span> এর দ্রাব্যতার উপর তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধির প্রভাব লিখ। (১.৫)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>(a) NaCl এর সম্পৃক্ত দ্রবণে তীব্র তড়িৎ বিশ্লেষ্য HCl এসিড দ্রবণ যোগ করলে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="width: 1.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1001.36em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-803"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-804"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.99em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-805"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-806"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.465em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-809" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">\rm {\rm Cl}^-</script></span> আয়নের ঘনমাত্রা বৃদ্ধি পাওয়ায় দ্রবণে NaCl এর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-810" style="width: 1.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.19em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-811"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-812"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-814"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-815"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mrow></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-49">\rm K_{ip}</script></span> এর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-818" style="width: 1.518em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.23em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-819"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-820"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-822"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-823"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-824" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-825" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p>(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-826" style="width: 2.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.22em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-827"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-828" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-830"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-832" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm KNO_3</script></span> এর দ্রবণ তাপ ধনাত্মক। অর্থাৎ দ্রবীভূত হওয়ার সময় তাপ শোষিত হয়। তাই এটি তাপহারী বিক্রিয়া।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21CC;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-833" style="width: 14.797em; top: -3.727em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo></msubsup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm KNO_3\left(aq\right)\rightleftharpoons K^+\left(aq\right)+NO_3^-(aq)</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="width: 2.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.22em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-867"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-870"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">\rm KNO_3</script></span> এর বিয়োজন ত্বরান্বিত হয় ও সাম্যাবস্থা ডানে সরে যায়। তাই দ্রাব্যতা বৃদ্ধি পায়।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p>(a) NaCl এর সম্পৃক্ত দ্রবণে তীব্র তড়িৎ বিশ্লেষ্য HCl এসিড দ্রবণ যোগ করলে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-873" style="width: 1.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1001.36em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-874"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-875"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.99em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-876"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-877"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.465em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-880" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm {\rm Cl}^-</script></span> আয়নের ঘনমাত্রা বৃদ্ধি পাওয়ায় দ্রবণে NaCl এর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-881" style="width: 1.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.19em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-882"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-883"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-885"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-886"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-887" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p style="text-align: justify;">(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-897" style="width: 2.707em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-898"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-901"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo></msubsup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\rm KNO_3\left(aq\right)\rightleftharpoons K^+\left(aq\right)+NO_3^-(aq)</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-937" style="width: 2.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.22em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-938"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-939" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-940" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-941"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-942" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-943" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\rm KNO_3</script></span> এর বিয়োজন ত্বরান্বিত হয় ও সাম্যাবস্থা ডানে সরে যায়। তাই দ্রাব্যতা বৃদ্ধি পায়; লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>এমন একটি পরাবৃত্তের সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর যার উপকেন্দ্র মূলবিন্দুতে এবং নিয়ামকরেখার সমীকরণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-944" style="width: 5.553em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.547em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1004.51em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-945"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-946" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-947" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-948" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-949" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-950" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-951" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">\rm4x+3=0</script></span>।</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>উপকেন্দ্র,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-952" style="width: 2.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1002.22em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-953"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-954" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-955" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-957" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-958" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-959" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">\rm S(0,0)</script></span>&nbsp;;</p>

<p>পরাবৃত্তের জন্য,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="width: 4.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.4em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-961"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-962" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-963" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-965" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\rm SP=PM</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-967" style="width: 15.248em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.71em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.707em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="vertical-align: 1.232em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -2.293em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.994em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\rm \Rightarrow\sqrt{\left(x-0\right)^2+\left(y-0\right)^2}=\left|\frac{4x+3}{\sqrt{4^2+0^2}}\right|</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>24</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="width: 22.953em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1054"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1055" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণেয় পরাবৃত্তের সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>24</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="width: 11.109em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1061" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong></p>

<p><b><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:SutonnyMJ"><span style="letter-spacing:-.1pt"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="width: 13.977em; top: -2.99em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1078"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1079"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.059em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.953em, 1008.03em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1080"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1081"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1089" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1091" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>24</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="width: 8.199em;                                 </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>প্রশ্নমতে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1155" style="width: 10.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1008.49em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1156"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1159" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1160" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1161" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1164" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1169" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">\rm P\times1^2+0=1\Rightarrow P=1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1170" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1171"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1172" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;উপবৃত্তের সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1173" style="width: 13.035em; <p>এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1208" style="width: 5.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.47em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1209"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="width: 2.42em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1225"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;উৎকেন্দ্রিকতা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\rm e=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^2}{a^2}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^2}{1^2}}=\sqrt{1-\frac{1}{4}}=\sqrt{\frac{3}{4}}=\frac{\sqrt3}{2}\ \left(Ans\right)</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টন:</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1287" style="width: 5.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.47em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1288"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1291" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1294" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1295" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1296" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1297" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">\rm a=1,b=\frac{1}{2}</script></span>; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1298" style="width: 3.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.543em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1002.54em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1299"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1302" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.95em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1303"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1304"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1305" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1306" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block;
